arguments.name: Start_date
arguments.description: A date that represents the start date.

arguments.name: End_date
arguments.description: A date that represents the end date.

arguments.name: Holidays
arguments.description: An optional range of one or more dates to exclude from the working calendar, such as state and federal holidays and floating holidays. The list can be either a range of cells that contains the dates or an array constant of the serial numbers that represent the dates.
